mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_tokens(text):
    tokens = re.findall('', text)
    frequency = Counter(tokens)
    nested_loops = any((token in ['for', 'while'] for token in frequency.keys()))
    conditions = any((token in ['if', 'else', 'elif', 'switch'] for token in frequency.keys()))
    return (frequency, nested_loops, conditions)

mutants.original_line: nested_loops = any(token in ['for', 'while'] for token in frequency.keys())
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_tokens(text):
    tokens = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b|[!@#%^&*().:;,<>/{}|?=\\-\\+\\[\\]"`~]', text)
    frequency = Counter(tokens)
    nested_loops = any((token not in ['for', 'while'] for token in frequency.keys()))
    conditions = any((token in ['if', 'else', 'elif', 'switch'] for token in frequency.keys()))
    return (frequency, nested_loops, conditions)

mutants.original_line: conditions = any(token in ['if', 'else', 'elif', 'switch'] for token in frequency.keys())

import re
from collections import Counter

def count_tokens(text):
    tokens = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b|[!@#%^&*().:;,<>/{}|?=\\-\\+\\[\\]"`~]', text)
    frequency = Counter(tokens)
    nested_loops = any((token in ['for', 'while'] for token in frequency.keys()))
    conditions = any((token in ['if', '', 'elif', 'switch'] for token in frequency.keys()))
    return (frequency, nested_loops, conditions)

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_tokens(text):
    tokens = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b|[!@#%^&*().:;,<>/{}|?=\\-\\+\\[\\]"`~]', text)
    frequency = Counter(tokens)
    nested_loops = any((token in ['for', 'while'] for token in frequency.keys()))
    conditions = any((token in ['if', 'else', 'elif', ''] for token in frequency.keys()))
    return (frequency, nested_loops, conditions)
